 InvalidateMsg (Component *component, Dispatcher *dispatcher, const Rect &rect)
virtual ~InvalidateMsg ()

Detailed Description

Post this message, if a component should be invalidated outside the thread-context of the control.
Parameters:
component Component which should get invalidated.
dispather Specifies the dispatcher which posted the message (e. g. the application). The parameter is not required by APOXI itself but might be interesting for customized needs.
rect Invalidation rectangle relative to the upper left of the component.
